dialogues.text: stops in front of the desk and snaps to attention.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Constable Ichiro Matsumoto presents captured prisoner Kobo, Chief Inspector Ohashi.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ich salutes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Inspector Ohashi will take charge of the prisoner.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ich uncuffs Kobo and steps aside to reveal --

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: standing at the far end of the room by the fuse box.  He' also bandaged and on crutches. Nick looks at Ohashi without saying a word, then flips th main switch up.  The lights and fans start working. He turns and walks out the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A small decoration ceremony.

dialogues.speaker: ON ICHIRO
dialogues.text: getting two golden suns pinned to the lapel of his dress uniform. In the far corner

dialogues.speaker: NICK, JOYCE AND
dialogues.text: Ichiro's wife, dressed in a formal kimono, watch the ceremony.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Joyce and Nick are sitting alone at a table.  Nick's left arm in in a sling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can't make you change your mind?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Last time you asked me to come along I nearly got a hole in my head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Might be different in New York.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe.  If I come visit, we can find out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'd like that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ich sits down with two fresh bowls of soba noodles.  Nick hesitates.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can do it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nick picks up his chopsticks with his good hand.  He begins to slurp the noodles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Louder, pal, louder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Joyce, give the assistant Chief Inspector a drink, would you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Joyce refills all their cups we...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's raining.  A sun shower.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Capt. Oliver is standing by the window watching the rain pour down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... Remember, counterfeiting is the Feds.  They'll be all over Abolofia's place.  Stick tight. You I.D. the other plate, he does real time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Right.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reveal Nick sitting in front of Oliver's desk, his one ar is still in a sling.  Nick gets to his feet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (still not facing him) You know, Nick, if you'd held on to that plate, you could've been a very rich man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oliver turns to face Nick.  Nick just looks at him, then:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Never crossed my mind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oliver nods; he believes him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Be careful on the run.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In contrast to the Japanese police station -- it's chaos. Cops are in every imaginable kind of dress, trash cans over flow, a handcuffed prisoner screams abuse to anyone who will listen.

dialogues.speaker: THE RAIDING PARTY
dialogues.text: a dozen men in all, are donning flak jackets and windbreakers with POLICE and TREASURY stenciled on the back.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: walks in with two heavy bullet proof vests slung over his shoulder.  He squeezes past the raiding party to find

dialogues.speaker: ICH
dialogues.text: sitting at a desk, thumbing through a Frommer's guide to New York City.  Nick drops one of the vests on the desk. It lands like a ton of bricks.  Ich continues to read. A Sergeant walks in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Saddle up.  Hard team in the first unit.  Conklin, your RMP awaits.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The cops and treasury men, grabbing their gear, head for the door. Nick is struggling to get into his vest using one arm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sure you want to come?  Probably better than the Greyline Tour.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ich stands up, shoves the guidebook in his back pocket. He helps Nick fasten the strap in back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You wouldn't make it without me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nick smiles, takes the Frommer's out of Ich's pocket and tosses it into the trash. Nick hands him a shotgun, takes another one off the rack for himself. We watch from behind as the two men head down the long hallway toward the exit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Think we'll get him, Nick?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We can't lose.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How can you be so sure?
